forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 67F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 24C. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 77F. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 23C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 75F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear in the evening then increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
